explanation: [0-0] On a snowy field, a bottle of Fanta orange soda and three strawberries are placed on the snow. Above them is a stone, and on the right is a right hand wearing a black glove.

[0-6] Firstly, the right hand wearing a black glove digs a pit in the snow. A person with short hair appears in the lower left corner of the screen, nodding continuously. The right hand puts the strawberries into the snow pit and fills the pit with snow. Then, it picks up the Fanta soda and pours it onto the snow pit. Afterwards, it places a white piece of paper with "24 HOURS" written on it. The paper is then taken away from the right side. The right hand wearing the black glove digs open the snow pit and takes out a huge strawberry from it, rotating the large strawberry with both hands. The person with short hair in the lower left corner opens their mouth wide and widens their eyes.
